data.description: tie iCal fils to Perl hashes
data.PS: The following links are only valid for module list maintainers:
data.rationale:
I have chosen Tie::iCal since the module uses Tie::File to access
    underlying iCalendar file. Tie::iCal ties iCalendar files to hashes
    in the most intuitive way. I have not been able to find a module
    with the same functionality that can read and write iCalendar files
    as well as merge them etc..
